about_the_game:
Grab a fistful of rockets and step into the bright red shoes of the legendary Sam "Serious" Stone as he reloads for an all-new battle against the nefarious minions of Lord Mental. Hunt down the mysterious ram-god of the Great Obelisk and unlock the secrets buried beneath the mystical temples dotting the sands of ancient Egypt. Then challenge your nerves with an intense new survival mode map or take aim in three brand new versus multiplayer maps.

Key Features

  • 3 New Single-Player and Cooperative Campaign Missions!
  • 3 New Versus Multiplayer Maps!
  • 1 New Survival Mode Map!
